briefdescription.para: Extended PWR HAL module driver. This file provides firmware functions to manage the following functionalities of the Power Controller (PWR) peripheral:

detaileddescription.para:
MCD Application Team
Extended Initialization and de-initialization functions
Extended Peripheral Control functions
